summary: This is an email from an Assistant United States Attorney in White Plains, NY, providing an update on FOIA requests related to Jeffrey Epstein's incarceration and death. It mentions that the Bureau of Prisons (BOP) is receiving new media requests and is trying to contact Mark Epstein, Jeffrey Epstein's brother, regarding prior communications.

events.title: Media requests surge after Times article
events.description: Following a New York Times article about Jeffrey Epstein's incarceration and death, the Bureau of Prisons receives multiple new FOIA requests from media outlets like ABC, CNN, and MuckRack.

keyFacts: The Bureau of Prisons (BOP) is receiving multiple new FOIA requests from media outlets (ABC, CNN, MuckRack) following a New York Times article about Jeffrey Epstein's incarceration and death.
BOP plans to quickly release the same records previously disclosed in response to these new requests.
A BOP FOIA specialist has been unsuccessfully trying to contact Mark Epstein, Jeffrey Epstein's brother, regarding prior communications.
Contact information for Mark Epstein (phone and email) and his associate Stacey Richman (email) is provided in the email.
